Question
========
  
A researcher investigates whether the number of children in a household has an influence on the level of risk-taking behaviour among adolescents. Risk-taking behavior is measured on a 5 -point Likert scale. This is an example of:
  
Answerlist
----------
* Univariate statistics with risk-taking behavior as dependent variable.
* Univariate statistics with risk-taking behavior as independent variable.
* Bivariate statistics with risk-taking behavior as dependent variable.
* Bivariate statistics with risk-taking behavior as independent variable.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
